segments.text: Do you have a reservation , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I am afraid we don't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . The restaurant is full now . You have to wait for about half an hour . Would you care to have a drink at the lounge until a table is available ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks . We'll come back later . May I reserve a table for two ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . May I have your name , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bruce . By the way . Can we have a table by the window ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll try to arrange it but I can't guarantee , sir .
segments.speaker: S1
